sub_title: Logistics Planner at E-llis Logistic Solutions & Supply Chain, Maastricht, Limburg
summary:
I am an accomplished project lead with more than 20 years’ experience in international and cross-functional projects in environment protection and logistics field. Background in building and maintenance of network with suppliers, customers and carriers for ensuring procurement and quick and accurate solving of discrepancies.
Internal ISO 9001 certified Auditor with proven track record of identifying operational and compliance related gaps. I am a multilingual person with three languages in my portfolio.
